original: @#/_/sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i man ngag
analyzed: @#/_/sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i man ngag
translated: The Great Magical Illusion🔽In Sanskrit: Mahayomopadesha

original: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma ha ma yo pa de sha_/bod skad du/_sgyu
analyzed: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma ha ma yo pa de sha_/bod skad du/_sgyu
translated: In Tibetan: sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i man ngag🔽Homage to Heruka.

original: 'phrul chen mo'i man ngag_/he ru ka la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/smras pa/_las kyi
analyzed: 'phrul chen mo'i man ngag_/he ru ka la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/smras pa/_las kyi
translated: It is said:🔽The karma vajra, with seven finger breadths,

original: rdo rje re ga phyed bcas bdun/_/thig le rlung gi bdag nyid las 'gro 'ong /_/
analyzed: rdo rje re ga phyed bcas bdun/_/thig le rlung gi bdag nyid las 'gro 'ong /_/
translated: moves in and out through the nature of the bindu and the wind.🔽The reality of the inseparability of the wind and the mantra🔽is the five superknowledges of bliss🔽through the path of the organ.

original: rlung dang sngags dbyer med pa'i de nyid gang /_/dbang po'i lam las bde ba'i
analyzed: rlung dang sngags dbyer med pa'i de nyid gang /_/dbang po'i lam las bde ba'i
translated: The bliss of the bindu and the wind🔽is the five superknowledges of bliss🔽through the path of the organ.🔽The five superknowledges of bliss🔽are produced by uniting the a and the ka

original: mngon shes lnga/_/'byung 'gyur a li ka li mnyam byas te/_/lte ba'i ri mor
analyzed: mngon shes lnga/_/'byung 'gyur a li ka li mnyam byas te/_/lte ba'i ri mor
translated: and applying them to the navel cakra,🔽which blazes above and drips below

original: sbyar bas stengs du 'bar/_/'og tu bdud rtshi thigs pa'i tshhul gyis 'bab/_/
analyzed: sbyar bas stengs du 'bar/_/'og tu bdud rtshi thigs pa'i tshhul gyis 'bab/_/
translated: with the stream of the elixir of immortality.🔽The upper and lower [winds] are applied in one and two

original: steng 'og gcig gnyis dag tu sbyar/_/yul dang dbang po'i grong 'joms pa/_/
analyzed: steng 'og gcig gnyis dag tu sbyar/_/yul dang dbang po'i grong 'joms pa/_/
translated: to destroy the city of the objects and the organs.🔽Those are the secret blockages of the wind.

original: rlung 'gog gsang ba de dag go/_/rlung dang thig le'i bde bsgrub pas/_/
analyzed: rlung 'gog gsang ba de dag go/_/rlung dang thig le'i bde bsgrub pas/_/
translated: By accomplishing the bliss of the wind and the bindu,🔽all the supreme paths of the three realms

original: khams gsum dag gis lam mchog gi/_/bud med ji snyed yod pa rnams/_/
analyzed: khams gsum dag gis lam mchog gi/_/bud med ji snyed yod pa rnams/_/
translated: and all the women

original: spyan sogs rig ma'i sbyor bas spyad/_/ro 'dzin sbyor bas mi phyed bcings/_/
analyzed: spyan sogs rig ma'i sbyor bas spyad/_/ro 'dzin sbyor bas mi phyed bcings/_/
translated: and the union of the tongue should be held without separation.🔽The nose of the man is joined in the middle of the nose of the woman,

original: rlung gi sbyor bas mi yi sna/_/sna yi rtshe mo'i dbus su sbyar/_/skad cig 'bar
analyzed: rlung gi sbyor bas mi yi sna/_/sna yi rtshe mo'i dbus su sbyar/_/skad cig 'bar
translated: and in an instant, it blazes and drips.

original: dang 'dzag par byed/_/snying ga'i dpa' bo zhu ba ste/_/de yang rang bzhin
analyzed: dang 'dzag par byed/_/snying ga'i dpa' bo zhu ba ste/_/de yang rang bzhin
translated: The hero of the heart melts, and that also is without intrinsic nature.

original: med pa'o/_/bde ba chen po sngags su brjod/_/de dag gong bu'i gzugs
analyzed: med pa'o/_/bde ba chen po sngags su brjod/_/de dag gong bu'i gzugs
translated: The great bliss is expressed in mantra, and those are the form of a single aggregate.

original: gcig ste/_/rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs 'thob/_/dri za'i sems
analyzed: gcig ste/_/rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs 'thob/_/dri za'i sems
translated: One obtains all the ornaments complete, and the body of the gandharva sentient being🔽dissolves into the coarse and subtle entities.

original: can rmi lam lus/_/rags dang phra ba'i dngos thim pa/_/sku gsum rnal 'byor
analyzed: can rmi lam lus/_/rags dang phra ba'i dngos thim pa/_/sku gsum rnal 'byor
translated: The yogin of the three kāyas meditates.

original: pa yis bsgom/_/mgrin pa'i pad+mar yi ge ge /_/yang na nor bur rtag tu bsam//
analyzed: pa yis bsgom/_/mgrin pa'i pad+mar yi ge ge /_/yang na nor bur rtag tu bsam//
translated: The syllable ge is always visualized in the lotus of the throat or in the jewel.🔽This practice is very secret.

original: sbyor ba 'di ni shin tu gsang /_/dang po'i lus ni de nas slar/_/sbom po'i
analyzed: sbyor ba 'di ni shin tu gsang /_/dang po'i lus ni de nas slar/_/sbom po'i
translated: Then, the body of the first [stage] again enters into the coarse element,

original: khams la yang dag 'jug_/yang dag mtha' la de 'gro ste/_/rnal 'byor
analyzed: khams la yang dag 'jug_/yang dag mtha' la de 'gro ste/_/rnal 'byor
translated: and it goes to the very limit of reality.

original: gnyid dang yang dag ldan/_/de nas/_dpag tshhad brgya yi khyon tsham du/_/
analyzed: gnyid dang yang dag ldan/_/de nas/_dpag tshhad brgya yi khyon tsham du/_/
translated: it shines forth to the extent of a hundred leagues.

original: 'di ni rab tu snang bar byed/_/rig pa dang bcas dpa' bo ni/_/rgyan
analyzed: 'di ni rab tu snang bar byed/_/rig pa dang bcas dpa' bo ni/_/rgyan
translated: The hero endowed with knowledge🔽should enjoy the mandala of offerings, with ornaments,

original: rnams spros dang me tog bcas/_/mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa spyad/_/
analyzed: rnams spros dang me tog bcas/_/mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa spyad/_/
translated: emanations, flowers, and so forth,🔽and the enjoyment of the desired enjoyments.

original: gong bu khu ba bu mo dag_/bkug nas 'dod pa'i longs spyod bya/_/nyi zla rlung
analyzed: gong bu khu ba bu mo dag_/bkug nas 'dod pa'i longs spyod bya/_/nyi zla rlung
translated: By the yoga of the sun, moon, and wind,🔽one becomes a knowledge-holder.

original: gi sbyor bas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/_de nas yang /_'di yis sgyu 'phrul
analyzed: gi sbyor bas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/_de nas yang /_'di yis sgyu 'phrul
translated: Then, by this, one becomes a great illusionist,

original: chen mor 'gyur/_/yon tan brgyad dam mchog yang na/_/dbang phyug brgyad
analyzed: chen mor 'gyur/_/yon tan brgyad dam mchog yang na/_/dbang phyug brgyad
translated: endowed with the eight qualities or the eight masteries.

original: dang ldan par 'gyur/_/rig mar lhan cig 'od gsal nas/_/kha tam ga ni lha
analyzed: dang ldan par 'gyur/_/rig mar lhan cig 'od gsal nas/_/kha tam ga ni lha
translated: From the clear light together with the knowledge consort,🔽the form of the deity is khaṭvāṅga,🔽the sound of the ḍamaru of wisdom is🔽Śrī Heruka’s heart.

original: yi sku/_/shes rab da ma ru yi sgra/_/shri he ru ka snying ga_/me ni sangs rgyas
analyzed: yi sku/_/shes rab da ma ru yi sgra/_/shri he ru ka snying ga_/me ni sangs rgyas
translated: The fire is the ḍākinī of the buddhas.🔽One should sing the song at midnight.

original: mkha' 'gro ma/_/nam phyed dus su glu blang ste/_/'di yis rdzogs sangs rgyas
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma/_/nam phyed dus su glu blang ste/_/'di yis rdzogs sangs rgyas
translated: By this, the perfect buddha

original: par 'gyur/_/ka li zla ba na da sogs/_/rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor 'dir shes bya//
analyzed: par 'gyur/_/ka li zla ba na da sogs/_/rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor 'dir shes bya//
translated: The complete yoga is to be known here in the Great [Wheel of] Illusions🔽as the yoga of nondual phenomena,

original: gnyis med chos kyi rnal 'byor te/_/rtshe ba'i sems kyis 'dir brjod pa'o/_/
analyzed: gnyis med chos kyi rnal 'byor te/_/rtshe ba'i sems kyis 'dir brjod pa'o/_/
translated: which is taught here with a compassionate mind.🔽Thus, having known the Great [Wheel of] Illusions,

original: de ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mo shes/_/'byung po ma kun rab grub 'gyur/_/kam+ba la
analyzed: de ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mo shes/_/'byung po ma kun rab grub 'gyur/_/kam+ba la
translated: all the spirits will be completely accomplished.🔽Kambala, Bodhibhadra,

original: dang klu bod zhabs/_/klu dang khyi mo'i zhal snga nas/_/d+harmas kyang ni de ltar
analyzed: dang klu bod zhabs/_/klu dang khyi mo'i zhal snga nas/_/d+harmas kyang ni de ltar
translated: and Nāropa also explained it in that way.

original: bshad/_/de nas bdag gis grub pa yin/_/slob dpon bya la'i zhabs
analyzed: bshad/_/de nas bdag gis grub pa yin/_/slob dpon bya la'i zhabs
translated: Then I became accomplished.

original: sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i man ngag🔽dngos grub brnyes pas mdzad pa d+harma'i zhal snga nas kyi rim pa dpal sgyu 'phrul
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i man ngag dngos grub brnyes pas mdzad pa d+harma'i zhal snga nas kyi rim pa dpal sgyu 'phrul
translated: This is the instruction of the Great [Wheel of] Illusions🔽composed by the accomplished master Jābir.

original: chen mo'i man ngag rdzogs snyo//_//🔽ma ha ma ya'i man ngag dang po 'di rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bo bud+ha pa tha'i
analyzed: chen mo'i man ngag rdzogs snyo//_// ma ha ma ya'i man ngag dang po 'di rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bo bud+ha pa tha'i
translated: The stages of the oral instruction of the glorious Great [Wheel of] Illusions are complete.

original: gsung las ta ra na thas bsgyur ba'o//_//
analyzed: gsung las ta ra na thas bsgyur ba'o//_//
translated: This first instruction of the Great [Wheel of] Illusions was translated by Tārānātha from the speech of Buddhapaṭha, the essence of all the victors.

original: phyi ma'i gu ru'i rdo rje'i spun nirba na shri las glegs bam steng nas zhus pa'o//_//
analyzed: phyi ma'i gu ru'i rdo rje'i spun nirba na shri las glegs bam steng nas zhus pa'o//_//
translated: The latter was received from Nirvanashri, a vajra-brother of the Guru of the future, from a book.
